comment: Not fun, smart or entertaining - at all. Will not play it again (not just saying that - we threw it out - recycled the cards, actually)

I invented a game (unpublished) just like this so when I heard about this game I bought it. I just don't like how it plays and have now gotten rid of this game.

Given away.

communal cards
 strategically shallow
 tediously tactical

Bit of a twist on a trick taking game. Lowest card played takes the highest numbered card played while the highest card played takes all the other played cards. Some interesting decisions to be made as you try to stay in the middle of the pack to avoid taking too many points.

.niet compleet : geen originele spelregels

It's too long and a bit dated. But it's interesting, I can't tell if you can strategies or just play what's in front of you. Reality is, just play with a pack of cards.
Very interesting card game. Never before have I been so torn between whether I should take a trick or not! See my review for more details...
One of the best, slickest trick-takers out there.
